summary: A Humble fully outdoor shack home firmly affixed to the side of a cliff, with a nice view and several neat features like openable windows and a lockable front door to keep out the nasty inhabitants of Skyrim, no need to worry about monsters sneaking in the windows or doors while you sleep.
descriptionHtml:
A Humble fully outdoor shack home firmly affixed to the side of a cliff, with a nice view and several neat features like openable and closeable windows and a bar able front door to keep out the nasty inhabitants of Skyrim, no need to worry about monsters sneaking in the windows or doors while you sleep.

GLORY BE UNTO THE GREAT POTATO TREE!

I kept it simple and convenient with a map marker teleport right inside the house, it has an alchemy table, workbench, tanning rack and cooking pot. to get past the barred door for the first time you can go about it a number of ways such as carefully jumping onto the porch, going back along the path and sliding down the mountain to the roof of the house OR simply fast traveling back to the house after discovering it

when you fast travel to the house the horse is stabled above and behind the house which has two paths that you can reach it from the house (one requires a leap of faith from the water barrel)

it also has a cave along the same path that leads to the house and at the other end of the cave is a twilight garden in honor of the great Azura

NEEDS MORE COMMENTS!

Requires
Hearthfire
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
I also suggest using a high resolution texture pack for rocks. I use this http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1760/?
author: Oldnotweak

files.name: Cliffs Retreat with anvil sharpening wheel and smelter
